description.en:
Welcome to HotZilla! HotZilla is Next Shiba Inu.
HotZilla is a Best token that rewards its holders with reflections every transaction. Which means, just by holding, believing, and supporting the coin, you automatically earn more $SHIB tokens. Our goal is to change people’s lives for the better. It’s a new opportunity for investors.

HotZilla is next Shiba Inu.
